channel.title: writePlayers();
channel.description:
Hi guys, i was wondering, i'm using project digzey and i wanted to know how to make my server do 2 things [ul][li]Make it says the correct wilderness lvel when in the wilderness[/li] [li]Show my "public void writePlayers" without it flashing on and off when in the wilderness[/li][/ul] SO any help peeps?
Regards - MikeScott

item.title: writePlayers();
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott
item.description:
@mikescott wrote:

public void writePlayers() { setInterfaceWalkable(13588); int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("", 13589); sendFrame126("", 13590); sendFrame126("@whi@Runescape the remake", 13591); sendFrame126("@gre@Players Online: " +players, 13592); sendFrame126("@cya@welcome!", 13593); //sendFrame126("", 13594); sendFrame126("", 13595); sendFrame126("", 13596); sendFrame126("", 13597); sendFrame126("", 13598); sendFrame126("", 13600); sendFrame126("", 13599); }[br][size=1]Posted on: October 12, 2007, 11:27:33 AM[/size][hr]KK, i done the writelpayers bit, but the wildy level gets stuck and doesnt move and stays at “Level: 0” public int WildyLevel = 0; public int leftwild = 0; public boolean InWildrange = false; public boolean inSafezone = false; public void WriteWildyLevel() { if (isInBarrows()) { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@whi@¤-Barrows-¤", 199); } else if (inSafezone()){ writePlayers(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("Level: "+WildyLevel, 199); } }

Read full topic
